profile.headline: Computer Science student majoring in Artificial Intelligence with hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, and software development.
profile.summary: Computer Science student majoring in Artificial Intelligence with hands-on experience in machine learning, deep learning, and software development[cite: 3]. Built and deployed AI and web-based systems such as Diebety AI Predict, SkolioCheck, ExploreID, and AndySaputraPortfolio to enhance efficiency and user interaction[cite: 4]. Proficient in Python, React.js, SQL, Deep Learning, and Machine Learning, continuously developing expertise in data-driven and intelligent system design[cite: 5].
profile.Hard_Skills:: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Python, C, Java, React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, SQL, Figma [cite: 51]
profile.Soft_Skills: Strong leadership, teamwork, and communication skills with experience managing diverse teams and collaborating across technical and non-technical projects[cite: 53]. Highly adaptable, organized, and solution-oriented with solid time management and problem-solving abilities[cite: 54].

projects.name: AndySaputraPortofolio
projects.description: I created a personal portfolio website that integrates an OpenAI-powered chatbot, providing real-time Q&A about my experience and skills[cite: 17]. This project demonstrates the use of AI for interactive web engagement, enabling dynamic, conversational access to professional information[cite: 18].
projects.impact: This project demonstrates the use of AI for interactive web engagement, enabling dynamic, conversational access to professional information[cite: 18].

projects.name: Explore ID
projects.description: I built a travel discovery web platform using React.js and SQL database integration, developed collaboratively under Scrum Agile methodology with clear task divisions across sprints and weekly stand-up reviews[cite: 20]. This iterative workflow enhanced team efficiency, ensured continuous feature testing, and yielded optimized search performance and a responsive UI/UX design[cite: 21]. The platform enables users to explore destinations easily while promoting local tourism engagement and showcasing practical teamwork and adaptability in real-world project execution[cite: 22].
projects.impact: ExploreID berpotensi mendorong ekonomi pariwisata dan UMKM melalui rekomendasi personal yang menaikkan belanja wisatawan dan memeratakan kunjungan ke kota non-mainstream, sekaligus membuka lapangan kerja inklusif bagi pemandu lokal (termasuk kelompok rentan) lewat sistem matching, rating, dan micro-credential; di sisi pengguna, itinerary otomatis yang memperhitungkan preferensi, anggaran, mobilitas, dan keamanan meningkatkan kualitas pengalaman (NPS/CSAT, waktu perencanaan lebih singkat) serta menurunkan refund/complaint; dari aspek keberlanjutan, rute efisien dan opsi transport rendah emisi membantu menekan jejak karbon serta mengurangi kepadatan destinasi melalui penyebaran kunjungan; sementara data agregat (heatmap demand, konversi tiket, tren minat) memberi intelijen bagi DMO/pemerintah untuk kampanye yang lebih tepat sasaran; keberhasilan dapat dipantau lewat KPI seperti % transaksi ke UMKM/guide lokal, itinerary completion rate, LOS kota sekunder, adopsi transport publik/EV, dan peningkatan pendapatan median pemandu—sehingga tercapai pariwisata Indonesia yang lebih inklusif, aman, dan berkelanjutan.

projects.name: Diebety AI Predict
projects.description: I developed a diabetes risk prediction system utilizing Logistic Regression, Random Forests, and XGBoost, achieving approximately 90% classification accuracy and enhancing explainability through SHAP-based feature analysis[cite: 23]. This project demonstrates the potential of AI to support early disease detection, enabling more proactive, data-driven health decisions for users[cite: 24].
projects.impact: Meningkatkan deteksi dini dan literasi kesehatan dengan memberikan estimasi risiko yang mudah dipahami, membantu triase di layanan primer serta prioritisasi pemeriksaan lanjutan; interpretabilitas SHAP meningkatkan kepercayaan klinis dan edukasi pasien, berpotensi menurunkan biaya komplikasi jangka panjang melalui intervensi preventif yang lebih cepat.

projects.name: SkolioCheck
projects.description: I developed a deep learning model that leverages the VGG16 architecture to detect scoliosis from X-ray images, thereby improving classification reliability and interpretability[cite: 26]. This project highlights the applicability of AI in healthcare diagnostics, offering a cost-effective preliminary screening tool for practitioners and research institutions[cite: 27].
projects.impact: Mempercepat skrining skoliosis dan membantu tenaga kesehatan memprioritaskan rujukan, khususnya di daerah dengan keterbatasan spesialis; potensi menekan waktu diagnosis dan biaya dengan decision-support awal, seraya membuka peluang tele-radiology dan pelatihan model berkelanjutan untuk peningkatan akurasi.
